desc: GNØMEFOLK is a collection of heirloom quality, handmade Nordic gnomes and decor. Our hand crafted goods are artisan made, unique and one of a kind. Each custom, hand stitched gnome makes the perfect hygge gift. FREE shipping on orders over $100. Shop our Norwegian / Swedish nisse, Danish tomte, and Finnish tontuu now.

layout.text: Handcrafted goods that bring magic to your moments.
